chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib

Class HBCentral

  • java.lang.Object
    • chdsw.philips.com.haraldlib.HBCentral

  • public class HBCentral
extends java.lang.Object
    Central class to connect and communicate with bluetooth devices.

        private void discoverBLEDevices(java.lang.String deviceAddress,
                                java.util.UUID serviceUUID,

        Parameters:

      • setTimeoutTimer

        private void setTimeoutTimer(java.util.UUID serviceUUID)
        Set scan timeout timer, timeout time is CONNECT_TIMEOUT. If timeout is executed the scan is stopped and connect failed.

      • cancelTimeoutTimer

        private void cancelTimeoutTimer()
        Cancel the scan timeout timer

      • stopScanning

        private void stopScanning()
        Stop with device discovery on a specific primary service

      • isCorrectDevice

        private boolean isCorrectDevice(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                                HBScanRecord scanRecord)
        Connect with the discovered device. If the deviceAddress is set, the found device address must be equal.
        Parameters:
        device - Discovered device
        Returns:
        Connect successful

      • connect

        private void connect(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device)
        Connect with the found device If the device is already connected, then don't create a new HBDevice
        Parameters:
        device - BLE device to connect with

      • updateScanMode

        private void updateScanMode(HBCentral.HBScanMode scanMode)
        Update the scanmode of central and set timers
        Parameters:
        scanMode - New scanmode of central

      • initialiseServices

        private void initialiseServices()
        Create the map of supported services by HaraldLib

      • getServiceHandler

        private HBServiceHandler getServiceHandler(HBDevice device,
                                           java.util.UUID serviceUUID)
        Get the service handler based on the device and supported services If device supports the given service UUID then return the handler
        Parameters:
        device - Device that must support the service
        serviceUUID - Service for which the handler is requested
        Returns:
        Service handler

        Parameters:
        deviceAddress - Address where the read write occured

      • getDeviceConnectionListener

        private HBDeviceConnectionListener getDeviceConnectionListener(java.lang.String address)
        Get the device connection listener based on the device address
        Parameters:
        address - Device address to find listener for
        Returns:
        device connection listener, null if not found
